seo.title: Krzyżanowski Luxury Furniture – Luxury Custom-Made Furniture
seo.description: Exclusive kitchens, wardrobes, and custom-made furniture. Krzyżanowski Luxury Furniture – style, quality, and unique designs for your home.

questions.question: Do you offer on-site measurements?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive service – we come to your location and take precise measurements ourselves to ensure the perfect fit of our furniture.

questions.question: Can we see material samples?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a wide selection of material samples, including Cleaf brand and many others. This allows you to see and choose materials that are perfect for your project.

questions.question: What materials do you work with?
questions.answer: We work exclusively with high-quality materials such as Cleaf boards, Blum fittings, and Salice systems. This ensures that our furniture is durable, functional, and aesthetically pleasing.

hero.title: We design and create furniture that harmoniously combines aesthetics with functionality, tailored to any interior.
